revision.text: <noinclude>{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMUpload |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template displays and annotates the metadata of uploaded media. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Calls template=Template:RMMedia }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} </noinclude><includeonly>{{RMMedia |Media subcategory=Media |CopyrightBy=[[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]] |CreationDate=[[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]] |RelatedArticles={{#arraymap:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[HasRelatedArticles::x]]|,}} |Filename=[[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]] |Description=[[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |Uploader=[[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]] |UploadDate=[[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]] |SubSectionOf={{#arraymap:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|,|x|[[subsection of::x]]|,}} |Keywords={{#arraymap:{{{Keywords|}}}|,|x|[[HasKeywords::x]]|,}} |Format=[[HasFormat::{{{Format|}}}]] }}[[Category:Media]]</includeonly><noinclude> </noinclude>

<noinclude>{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMImage |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Displays and annotates the metadata of an uploaded image. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Calls template=Template:RMMedia }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} </noinclude><includeonly>{{RMMedia |Media subcategory=Image |CopyrightBy=[[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]] |CreationDate=[[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]] |RelatedArticles={{#arraymap:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[HasRelatedArticles::x]]|,}} |Filename=[[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]] |Description=[[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |Uploader=[[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]] |UploadDate=[[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]] |SubSectionOf={{#arraymap:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|,|x|[[subsection of::x]]|,}} |Keywords={{#arraymap:{{{Keywords|}}}|,|x|[[HasKeywords::x]]|,}} |Format=[[HasFormat::{{{Format|}}}]] }}[[Category:Image]]</includeonly><noinclude> </noinclude>

<noinclude>{{Template

}}[[Category:Pdf]]</includeonly>

<noinclude>{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMDocument |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Annotates and displays the metadata of a document. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Calls template=Template:RMMedia }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} </noinclude><includeonly>{{RMMedia |Media subcategory=Document |CopyrightBy=[[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]] |CreationDate=[[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]] |RelatedArticles={{#arraymap:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[HasRelatedArticles::x]]|,}} |Filename=[[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]] |Description=[[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]] |Uploader=[[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]] |UploadDate=[[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]] |SubSectionOf={{#arraymap:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|,|x|[[subsection of::x]]|,}} |Keywords={{#arraymap:{{{Keywords|}}}|,|x|[[HasKeywords::x]]|,}} |Format=[[HasFormat::{{{Format|}}}]] }}[[Category:Document]]</includeonly><noinclude> </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMList |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template lists all media which has been uploaded and attached to a particular article. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMList
|show=True}}
|hints for templates and forms=To attach uploaded media to an article, the property "subsection of" must be annotated. |Calls template=Template:RMListOuterTable }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{RMListOuterTable}}|}}

|- | align="center" bgcolor="white" | {{{1}}} {{RMCategoryLinkIcon|{{{1}}}}} | bgcolor="white" | {{#rmew:{{{1}}}|{{RMNoNamespace|{{{2}}}}}|800|600}} | bgcolor="white" | [[{{{3}}}]] | bgcolor="white" | {{#dateformat:{{{4}}}|ISO 8601}}{{{4}}} | align="center" bgcolor="white" | [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_info_icon_16x16.png]   [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=formedit}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_edit_with_forms_icon_16x16.gif] | bgcolor="white" align="center" | [{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=delete}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_delete_icon_16x16.png]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMListOuterTable |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Builds the outer table |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| border="1" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0px; border-collapse: collapse;" | align="center" bgcolor="#455387" style="padding-top: 5px;" |Attached documents, images and media {| class="wikitable sortable" bgcolor="white" border="0" |- bgcolor="lightgrey" ! align="center" style="padding:5px;" | Category !! style="padding:5px;" | Filename !! style="padding:5px;" | Uploaded by !! class="unsortable" style="padding:5px;" | Creation date !! class="unsortable" style="padding:5px;" | Metainformation !! class="unsortable" style="padding:5px;" | Delete |- {{#ask: [[Category:Media]][[HasRelatedArticles::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Image:+]]OR[[Document:+]]OR[[Pdf:+]]OR[[Video:+]]OR[[Audio:+]] | ?HasFilename | ?HasUploader | ?HasCreationDate | format=template | template=RMListInnerTable | link=none }} |} |- | {| style="width:100%;" |- | Manual refresh list: [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=purge}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_refresh_icon_16x16.gif] || align="right" | {{#rmf: {{FULLPAGENAME}} }} |} |}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMMedia |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template displays information of media (i.e. document, image, etc) in a box. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMMedia
|Media subcategory
|CopyrightBy
|CreationDate
|RelatedArticles
|Filename
|Description
|Uploader
|UploadDate
|Keywords
|SubSectionOf
|Format
}}
|Calls template=Template:Display content navigation box }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #aaa; background: #fff; float: right; clear: right; width: 20em" ! colspan="2" style="background: #996699; color: white" | ''{{{Media subcategory|}}}'' |- {{Tablerow|Label=Filename:|Value={{{Filename|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Copyright by:|Value={{{CopyrightBy|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Creation date:|Value={{{CreationDate|}}} }} |- {{#ifeq:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}||| {{Tablerow|Label=Related articles:|Value={{{RelatedArticles|}}} }} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Keywords:|Value={{{Keywords|}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Format:|Value={{{Format|}}} }} |} {{Display content navigation box |Title={{{Filename|}}} |Summary={{{Description|}}} |Author={{{Uploader|}}} |Creation date={{{UploadDate|}}} |SubsectionOf={{{SubSectionOf|}}} }}

|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Cite web in help |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=Displays a box in articles which fall under GFDL. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Cite web in help
|wiki=
|url=
|title=
|retrieved=
|publisher=
}}
}} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }}
;References
The content of this page uses material from the article [{{{url}}} {{{title}}}] published by {{{publisher}}} (retrieved on {{{retrieved}}}).
This article is licensed under the [[GNU Free Documentation License]].

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Copyright of article |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=Displays a box for an article containing copy right info. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Copyright of article
|own work=
|year=
|copyright holder=
|url=
|title=
|date retrieved=
}}
|hints for templates and forms=Set "own work" to "True" if you have the copyright of the article, false otherwise. |Calls template=Template:GNU Free Documentation License,Template:Cite web in help }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 |date retrieved=2009/03/29 }} {{#ifeq:{{{own work|}}}|True|{{GNU Free Documentation License |year={{{year|}}} |copyright holder={{{copyright holder|}}} }} |{{ Cite web in help |url={{{url|}}} |title={{{title|}}} |retrieved={{{date retrieved|}}} |publisher={{{copyright holder|}}} }} }}

;Copyright © {{{year}}} {{{copyright holder}}}.
Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.2 or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; with no Invariant Sections, no Front-Cover Texts, and no Back-Cover Texts. A copy of the license is included in the article "[[GNU_Free_Documentation_License|GNU Free Documentation License]]". 
{{
GNU Free Documentation License
|year=
|copyright holder=
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Short description|}}}|| {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=}} | {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Form=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Semantic form ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value=''main namespace''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value={{{Has special namespace|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value={{{Example article|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Category=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Category ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}

'''Note –''' {{{1}}} 
{{Note|Note Text}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the Wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Form |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} == Parameters == {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''no parameters given...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} {{#ifeq:{{{hints for templates and forms|}}}||| {{Note|{{{hints for templates and forms|}}}}} }} == Interaction with other templates and forms == This template calls: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* no template|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* no other template or form}} This template is populated by {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* not populated by any form}} [[Category:Template]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Display content navigation box |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section |rationale=This template is used for providing and annotating meta data fields for arbitrary content. |long description=__NOTITLE__ The template does the following *sets "subsection of" relationship and prints it as supersection(s) *queries for subsections and prints them *sets a title *sets author(s) if given *sets and prints a summary if given |parameters=The template should be called in the following format: 
{{Display content navigation box
|Title
|Summary
|Author
|Creation date
|SubsectionOf
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the Wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Form |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} == Parameters == {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''no parameters given...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} {{#ifeq:{{{hints for templates and forms|}}}||| {{Note|{{{hints for templates and forms|}}}}} }} == Interaction with other templates and forms == This template calls: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* no template|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* no other template or form}} This template is populated by {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* not populated by any form}} [[Category:Template]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Display content navigation box |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section |rationale=This template is used for providing and annotating meta data fields for arbitrary content. |long description=__NOTITLE__ The template does the following *sets "subsection of" relationship and prints it as supersection(s) *queries for subsections and prints them *sets a title *sets author(s) if given *sets and prints a summary if given |parameters=The template should be called in the following format: 
{{Display content navigation box
|Title
|Summary
|Author
|Creation date
|SubsectionOf
}}

}} }} |}
